casebody.data:
IN RE: Charles Everette HINTON 449P11-19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Charles E. Hinton, for Hinton, Charles Everette Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of May 2018 by Petitioner for Petition for Pardon and Discharge from Imprisonment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
